resources:
Quality Sheet Settings
Select Job Enter Job Details Select Auditor Name Row Number Select Week Number Select House Number Please grant all permissions to proceed
tandg.qualitysheet
//---------------------COMMON-------------------------------- Name Enter comments if needed Submit Pass Fail Last Quality Percentage : Select comment from the list
//-------------------CLIPPING------------------------------- 1) Clip position: not above a truss/one clip between truss/half twist (0) 2) Broken heads and trusses (3 each) 3) Broken heads replaced and bobbin hung (0) 4) Laterals: take laterals from previous clip to the head, fail if larger than finger nail (3 each) 5) Comments \neg: 10 broken heads, no half twist, clipping height poor, needs training (Select comment if needed)
//-------------------DROPPING------------------------------- 1) Spacing: heads levelled and vines going down are spaced (0) 2) Angle is correct - drop and shift the same - Cubes not ripped (3 each) 3) Stems on the hoops, turning around properly (0) 4) Minimize floor fruit and broken trusses (3 each) 5) Comments \neg: vines are braided and bunchy but heads are levelled well, turning at the fronts/ backs needs improvement (Select comment if needed)
//-------------------PRUNING------------------------------- 1) Accuracy: prune to the correct number and remove flag leaf + King fruit (3 each) 2) Position of arch: proper (3 each) 3) Pruning and arching at the right stage. Arch: as long as it fits and doesn\'t touch last bud (3 each) 4) No broken trusses (3 each) 5) Comments \neg: poor contact between arch and truss, arch too close fo the stem, pruning too hard (Select comment if needed)
//-------------------TWISTING------------------------------- 1) Trusses and leaves not trapped, and not wound too much (0) 2) Broken heads and trusses (3 each) 3) Broken heads replaced and bobbin hung (0) 4) Laterals: take laterals from previous twist to the head, fail if larger than finger nail (3 each) 5) Comments \neg: 10 broken heads, twisting the wrong way, needs training, trusses cught under string (Select comment if needed)
//-------------------DELEAFING------------------------------- 1) Clean cut - minimize stubs and bad cuts (3 each) 2) Accuracy: correct range of leaves removed for whole line (3 each) 3) Stem and middle laterals taken, stems on hoops (3 each) 4) Laterals: no sliced fruit, minimizes broken trusses, dead plants reported (1 each) 5) Comments \neg: sent back to fix stubs, sliced through a stem, string not cut (Select comment if needed)
//-------------------PICKING------------------------------- 1) No floor fruit (0) 2) Colour stage and missing fruit (0) 3) Fruit graded out: rotten, damaged, miss-set (0) 4) No plant materials and calyx (0) 5) Comments \neg: 10 broken heads, no half twist, clipping height poor, needs training (Select comment if needed)
//-------------------NAMES-------------------------------
SELECT
